page.title: 11PREPARING FOOD:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: {PREPARING FOOD A refridgerator is free standing metal cupboard, electrically operated, in which perishable foods are kept cool, particularly useful during the summer period. Freezers, now widely used are similar, but keep food at a tempreture of minus eighteen degrees centigrade. Food can be kept upto a year before being eaten, it must be thoroughly defrosted before use. Both these items enable the housewife to shop less frequently. Food mixers are basically used for making cakes and bread, beating ingredients quickly to the correct consistancy. Food processors not only mix ingredients for cakes but shred, grate and chop. Cookers, all homes have them, run by electricity,bottled gas or solid fuel.
